title: Travel App
description: Carpe Mundi, is a travel agency app project
body: On the app you will be able to tailor your journey to your preferences. Exclude destinations or upgrade your stay to a top-tier hotel. It's all about enjoying a unique experience on your terms. You decide if you want your destination to be a surprise. Two days before your outbound flight, we'll reveal the destination and accommodation via email. No need to plan; the countdown begins! With no expectations, travel to a destination waiting to be discovered. It's that simple! Embrace every second of your trip without worries.

title: Interactive App
body:
Hey there, I whipped up this app with mobiles in mind, so it's all slick and dandy on any screen. The secret sauce? OpenWeatherMap API! It pulls in all the deets you need: city name, date, cute weather icons, temp, humidity, and even wind speed. But hold on, there's more! ‚òÄÔ∏è
Peep the 5-day forecast ‚Äì it's like a crystal ball for weather nerds. And I got your back with the search history thing. Saves your searches so you don't have to type it all out again.
Wait, there's a rad trick too ‚Äì the dashboard goes dark or light, depending on if it's sunbathing or stargazing time in the city you're checking. Plus, it's like magic ‚Äì finds where you are and tells you the weather there. No more guessing if it's raining outside! You decide if you want your destination to be a surprise. Two days before your outbound flight, we'll reveal the destination and accommodation via email. No need to plan; the countdown begins!  With no expectations, travel to a destination waiting to be discovered. It's that simple! Embrace every second of your trip without worries.

title: Card Generator
body:
Okay, get this ‚Äì we're talking about a team dashboard, a snazzy Node command-line thingy. You feed it info about your crew, and it cooks up this super cool HTML page that's like, alive!
Imagine you're the boss ‚Äì you toss in deets about your peeps, and bam! You've got a webpage that's all lively and stuff. Who needs boring spreadsheets, right? üòâ

title: Business Landing App
body:
Yo, check this out ‚Äì it's like a quiz app but all about JavaScript, the code wizardry stuff. You ready? Cool, here's the deal:
You're gonna get hit with 5 random questions, like pop quizzes but cooler. You've got 50 seconds on the clock to prove your skills. And here's the kicker ‚Äì your score depends on how much time you've got left. So, like, speed is key!
But wait, there's a twist ‚Äì every time you slip up and get a question wrong, I'm gonna snatch away 10 precious seconds from your timer. No pressure, right? üòÖ

title: News
body:
Hey there, revheads! Say hello to P1, your one-stop virtual hangout for all things F1. We've got the freshest scoop, live standings ‚Äì you name it. But guess what? There's more! Brace yourself for the coolest card game in town, where being an F1 guru is your golden ticket to winning big.
By the way, I'm the styling and animation wizard behind the scenes, conjuring up that sleek and eye-catching look you're loving. And don't forget the news section ‚Äì that's my baby too. So while you dive into the F1 universe and master the card game, know that I've got you covered with style, animations, and the latest hot-off-the-track updates. üèéÔ∏è üéâ

title: Planner
body:
Get ready to seize the day with the Daily Planner App ‚Äì your trusty sidekick for making every hour count. No more forgetting those important appointments or meetings. This app's got your back with a simple and efficient way to track your schedule, especially when you're grinding it out from 9 to 5!
And guess what? The magic doesn't stop there. This app knows the importance of mood lighting ‚Äì it changes colours based on the time of day. Talk about setting the right vibes, huh? Oh, and here's the kicker ‚Äì your todos? Yeah, they're not going anywhere. They're safe and sound, ready for you whenever you need 'em. Time to conquer your day! üìù ‚úÖ
